name: Hey Sailor!
description:
Hey Sailor! is a video-game for Amstrad CPC 464 powered with CPCTelera. It is a video-game  based on the original “Bosconian”. 

You will meet Ronaldo, he was an honest man, a fisherman who was used to work  hard every day to feed his poor family, but every night, to run away from reality, he  devoured books about the adventures of pirates. So many stories he read, that his  mind just went upset. He ended up becoming Captain Rumaldo, the worst pirate  you've ever heard of, and you'll have to help him clean the seven seas of sailors.
